Build-Depends: debhelper-compat (= 13), cmake (>= 3.26.4-3~), hipcc, libamdhip64-dev, libgtest-dev <!nocheck>, librocthrust-dev
Description: Efficient STL-like Data Structures on the GPU stdgpu is an open-source library providing several generic GPU data structures for fast and reliable data management. Multiple platforms such as CUDA, OpenMP, and HIP are supported allowing you to rapidly write highly complex agnostic and native algorithms that look like sequential CPU code but are executed in parallel on the GPU.
Package-List: libstdgpu-hip-dev deb libdevel optional arch=any libstdgpu-hip0d deb libs optional arch=any libstdgpu-openmp-dev deb libdevel optional arch=any libstdgpu-openmp0d deb libs optional arch=any
